name: Undergrowth (VanillaThunda)
description: VR game created for the Epic Games Mega Jam 22. The theme was "As Above, So Below" and I was inspired by the image of a tree with its branches and roots mirroring each other. The is the first game I have made with Unreal Engine and while still somewhat unfinished, this jam was a great way to dive in head first! Built with OpenXR and Unreal Engine 5.
